episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Christmas
episodes.summary: Brian and Georgina gather around their little plastic Christmas tree and celebrate the festive season in traditional style with tales of lonely polar bears, fake snow, and animals tastefully dressed as Santa. There will also be some egg nog and a return of the smelly Yuletide candle that annually makes Brian feel a little queasy.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 40]
episodes.summary: Brian decides he's not going the edit the programme today and instead just put it out exactly as it leaves the studio. Good idea? You decide. Plus, Georgina learns about gravity and Brian gets mugged by a seagull.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing {Ep 39}
episodes.summary: A fish with headlights. Plus, an inflatable unicorn horn, a baby vomiting in the back of a car and how to lose weight by being run over. Also, Georgina being useful in a haystack.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 38]
episodes.summary: A Lego man with a raspberry on his head. Plus, baby racing, building rockets, seventies wallpaper and a ship called Boaty McBoatface. Also, Georgina dances with naked rabbits and Brian rubs bread on his face.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 37]
episodes.summary: Fish in sandals. Plus, tea picked by virgins, hog curling, a tax on lady gardens and a squatty, potty stool.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 36]
episodes.summary: Watching a puddle. Plus, do koala bears make good drinking partners, dating Disney characters, racoons washing candyfloss and the long awaited return of banana facts. Also, Georgina turns into Miss Marple and Brian turns off several radiators.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 35]
episodes.summary: Brian and Georgina gather around their Christmas tree in leafy Crouch End to record their traditional festive podcast. Featuring egg nog, Brussels sprouts, gifts, scented candles, ghostly chickens, pantomimes and a stalking Yule cat. Plus, Georgina puts an onion in her sock and Brian throws a poo log on the fire.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 34]
episodes.summary: Wombat pulled alive from dog. Plus, farting goat flavoured crisps, fondue sets, iKettles, pigs in blankets and Wrinkles the Clown. Also, Brian has a problem with his socks.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 33]
episodes.summary: How to unboil an egg. Plus, Britain's booziest duck, the mouse and the python, a painting of a kitten with a weird underbite and the sound of no nuts falling. Also, how Carpetright got it so carpet wrong.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 32]
episodes.summary: An elephant on a trampoline. Plus, square babies from the 16th century, making sandwiches on the toilet, typing with your nose, 11 duvets and a 20 year old condom.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 31]
episodes.summary: Things that look like other things, cauliflowers that creak and a stowaway French mouse. Plus, Brian throws his belt out of the window and Georgina puts a brick in the sink

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 30]
episodes.summary: A special bumper episode to celebrate 10 years of Sowerby & Luff podcasts. Featuring flashbacks from 2005 when it all began, and a bucket load of curious clips from B&G's podcasting travels.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 29]
episodes.summary: Would you have plastic surgery to look like William Shakespeare? Plus, sheep joining in with Swan Lake, mushrooms that look like little men,  mice singing Billy Joel songs, and a dog smoking a pipe.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 28]
episodes.summary: You can’t give lettuce to a duck. Plus, International Pie Day freezing your hair, when seagulls attack, a translation device for cats, and getting glassed by a basilisk on a Friday night.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 27]
episodes.summary: Cats attacking bananas. Plus, photographs of people coughing, Redhead Awareness Day  and vegetables that begin with the letter D. Also, Brian wears Georgina on his head and a man in his pants jumps into the snow in Boston.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 26]
episodes.summary: Does eating eggs make you more generous? Plus, kangaroos serving in McDonalds, a penguin with a cat on its head and the Loch Ness Monster in a soup pan.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 25]
episodes.summary: A cat-eating alligator. Plus, Georgina is up for the Nobel Prize for Quantum Physics and Brian is introduced to whiskey.  Also, when is a moon not a moon and would you let a Chinese toddler drive you home from the pub?

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 24]
episodes.summary: From frosty north London it's a bumper festive edition of Brian & Georgina's award nominated podcast. Join B&G as they open their pressies and swig egg nog around the Christmas tree. And don't forget to go and download their sensational Christmas EP from iTunes!

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 23]
episodes.summary: Pickled onions on the doorstep. Plus, cats in circles, tiny potatoes, scurrying geckos, and haunted wheelchairs. Also, Georgina asks for ice cream and Brian hooks up with the world's hairiest charity campaign Decembeard.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 22]
episodes.summary: How tall is your bread? Plus, bathing in beer, slutty ladybirds, Octopus Awareness Day, a dolphin in Starbucks and a man whose been banned for falling over. Also, Brian does some aggressive mopping and Georgina wants to weigh her head.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 21]
episodes.summary: Hiding big things behind small things. Plus, invisible buildings, chatting chairs, porn-addicted pilots and a singing road.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 20]
episodes.summary: Who collects nutmeg graters? Plus, torn socks, biscuit jeopardy, do cats eat spiders, sticking pork up your nose and donkeys from space. Also, did Jesus have a bike and does Brian smell of alpha dog?

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 19]
episodes.summary: What percentage cat is a hairbrush? Plus, a tortoise disguised as a hamburger, a baby with a comb-over and why would a walrus go to a tupperware party?

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 18]
episodes.summary: How to talk to your cat about gun safety. Plus, pug dogs in armour, neck beard, sealions' whiskers and diamonds falling from the sky in Gainsborough. Also, Brian wears out his shoes and Georgina gets a new phone.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 17]
episodes.summary: Peaches in pants. Plus, 29 Sumo wrestlers on a plane, super ants head for London, and a man pushing a sprout to the top of a mountain with his nose.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 16]
episodes.summary: A worm that can't get drunk. Plus a piglet in ankle warmers, soft bodied invertibrates and the Duck of Justice. Also, Brian sits on arse putty and Georgina buys some pants.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 15]
episodes.summary: A camera mounted on a caterpillar. Plus, Neanderthals, gobstoppers and spacedust.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 14]
episodes.summary: Scotland's fattest hedgehog. Plus, crib dribblers and a chicken wielding stag.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 13]
episodes.summary: An otter that looks like Elton John. Plus, a naked bike ride in Canterbury and an accountant falls on a crocodile in Murmansk.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 12]
episodes.summary: Controlling the world with a huge cheeseboard. Plus, Monty Don's magic jacket, the world's longest drum roll and a cat sitting on a corner.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 11]
episodes.summary: A bee-keeping donkey. Plus, growing TV sets on a farm, porn cupcakes, bio-luminous plants, and the secret life of mushrooms. Also, Georgina invents a corrugated iron umbrella.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 10]
episodes.summary: A Russian woman in a puddle. Plus powdered alcohol, a giant rabbit, rats eating chocolate Easter eggs and Georgina doing a magic act with some hedgehogs.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 9]
episodes.summary: A great big lime green chameleon. Plus, two anteaters in a washing machine, vibrating shoes, X-Factor auditions, strange dreams about chickens and a drunk man trying to climb over a fence. Also, putting things in the wrong jars. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 8]
episodes.summary: A vending machine on the moon. Plus, reaching things that are high up, rotten mice, flour made out of coffee and a good size live toad. Also, Georgina flicks her limpet.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 7]
episodes.summary: Hat lures woman into tree. Plus, travel-sized twigs for sale, tripping up penguins and a goat simulator. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 6]
episodes.summary: How can you tell when a penguin is in love with you? Plus, goat wars, monster repellent spay, a lorryload of dead badgers, and a sex corridor for a moose. Also, bruising grapes with your nose, contagious yawning, painting horses like zebras and a rabbit being sucked up a chimney. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 5]
episodes.summary: Was Stonehenge a giant xylophone? Plus, a squirrel with a horse's head, rampaging chihuahuas and cats with jet packs. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 4]
episodes.summary: How a goldfish could vacuum your house. Plus a chihuahua with the rear end of a chicken and a snail that used a sweet packet as a raft to escape a flood. Also, a book that poses the question are trout South African?

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 3]
episodes.summary: A top hat that brushes your teeth. Plus chickens with dinosaur tails, penguins on anti-depressants, a frog on the stairs and a cat in a pie factory.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 2]
episodes.summary: Injecting spaghetti into your veins. Plus, missing sea eagle heads for Blackpool, software for mixing cocktails, and a delivery man with an empty pizza box.  Also a woman who charges men to watch her eat and a cute dog who wears slippery shoes. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Sowerby and Luff's Big Thing [Ep 1]
episodes.summary: Bumper first episode of a brand new series of podcasts from Brian Luff and Georgina Sowerby. Featuring, an over-popular finger monkey, a man dressed as a horse, a home-made sex doll and a ghost ship crewed by cannibal rats. Plus, on-the-spot fines for drunk students, escaped chickens on a motorway, and a man who can inflate tyres with his nose. Also Georgina cleans her Shakra, and is Brian being stalked by Gareth Malone? To buy B&G and G&T go to sowerbyandluff.com now.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 100]
episodes.summary: The last podcast in the current series - a bumper Christmas special featuring a rubber duck dressed as the Archbishop of Canterbury. Plus, the latest Christmas cracker jokes, Rudolf's dangling baubles, and the Virgin Mary in a crash helmet. Also, Georgina buys some Eggnog Ice Cream and Brian plans to separate some eggs in 2014. Happy Holidays from Sowerby & Luff! See you in the New Year!

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep99]
episodes.summary: A Psychic Taco. Plus, smart wigs, houseproud Neanderthals, a singing nun, and a fish pie made of gold. Also, Simon Cowell marries Debbie Harry and Georgina becomes a Flat Stanley. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep98]
episodes.summary: A baby in a tube. PLus, shrinking pasties, bushy pubes, a huge Chinese toilet, and a camel that sounds like Family Guy. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 97]
episodes.summary: Shave the baby. Plus, a 507 year old clam called Ming, and Brian decides to paint himself blue. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 96]
episodes.summary: Mistaking cheese burgers for shoes. Plus, a kidnapped llama, cooking with semen, and a beagle trained to find bed bugs on polar bears. Also, cities with little legs, a hobbit house full of sheep, and a cat crossing the road. This podcast contains strong language, evil eyebrows and a woman punching cats.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 95]
episodes.summary: A deeply disapponting tin of tomatos. Plus, beer ice cream, squirrels vandalising bicycles and the world's most boring soccer score. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 94]
episodes.summary: Crushing professional boredom. Plus, surrounded by geraniums, fat blasting, wine for cats, humming fish, Ottermums, a mysterious goat and a canary that looks like Donald Trump. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 93]
episodes.summary: Football managers thinking about soup. Plus, changing the sheets in a sex box, fly vomit, dating sites for dead people and a rant about microwaving frozen peas. This podcast contains strong language and some some sexual references.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 92]
episodes.summary: Estate agents for ants. Plus singing mice, a giant mushroom and Larry the Cat.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 91]
episodes.summary: How to suck out your brain through your ear. Plus, Zola the breakdancing gorilla, fighting prawns, donkey robots and a man with a nose on his forehead. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 90]
episodes.summary: An egg on a stick. Plus, crop circles on Google Earth, a whale's earwax, moon-shaped honey cakes, and sucking the lungs out of bats. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 89]
episodes.summary: Advice for self-employed wasps. Plus, bats in a wind turbine, pet iguanas, miniature horses, and can a pig open a ring pull can? May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 88]
episodes.summary: A tiny brain in a bottle. Plus foxes in clogs and a man in ancient socks looking for big cats. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 87]
episodes.summary: Sowerby & Luff drop into the world-famous Station Inn in Whitby. Plus, Captain James T. Cook, Marmite on the moon, two llamas, a clone of John Lennon and the result of B&G's sketch act competition at the Gilded Balloon in Edinburgh.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 86]
episodes.summary: A Nightingale Shat* in Berkeley Square. Plus, a queue of shoes, chicken-wing ice cream, a stick of Walri, and investing your savings in Beanie Babies. *Shat = past participle, past tense of shit (Verb). This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 85]
episodes.summary: How to avoid huge ships. Plus, chips v spicy potato wedges, bubble wrap bikes, freeloading streetlights, low trees, hard hats and a drunk, aggressive zebra fish. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 84]
episodes.summary: A tiny frog with an umbrella. Plus, noisy air-conditioners, an elusive hippo, a baby prince called George and a bloat of Biebers. This show was produced in association with the new Audio Technica AT2020 USB+.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 83]
episodes.summary: Can the world's energy crisis be solved by harnessing power from urine on the staircases of thousands of multi-story car parks? Plus, a non-linear cow, slime from aroused snails, and policing by geese. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 82]
episodes.summary: Confusing the ducks on Hampstead Heath. Plus, motorised unicycles, fake lettuce, and a Mexican wave of crickets. Also, a tiny mayor and a dog dressed as 17 century nobility. This podcast contains strong language an a small potato.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 81]
episodes.summary: Exploding rhubarb chutney. Plus, animals with pictures of Star Wars characters on their bodies, peanut butter and jelly soda, and a woman who married a bridge. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 80]
episodes.summary: Algebra with a yucca plant. Plus, shoplifting goldfish, dubious dumplings and a Brazilian Treehopper. Also, a crap Elvis impersonator in the back garden, Keith Richards' box of tissues and a woman standing underneath an oak tree waiting for Edward IV. May contain mild swearing.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 79]
episodes.summary: A cat-like alien with Cellotape over its bottom. Plus, Guinea Pigs jousting on the backs of Jack Russell Terriers, anti-pervert tights, ill-equipped Morris Dancers and a plant that eats sheep. Also a Tarantino snail and a brand new item called "Letters That Are the Wrong Way Around". This podcast may contain mild swearing.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 78]
episodes.summary: Can you tell the difference between a coconut and a hedgehog? Plus, a cat uses a duck as a nipple clamp and Brian gets a pizza delivered by a remote controlled helicopter. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 77]
episodes.summary: A pink slug in a blender. Plus, ants who ring your doorbell, disused volcanoes, Pliny the Elder and a chain of Little Chef Restaurants in the Sahara Desert. Also, an app that drops a piano on your head and what's the footprint of an arse.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 76]
episodes.summary: Unicorn and Ale Pie. Plus, a C3P0 Cellotape dispenser, cheese police in Gloucester and a tiny toilet roll. Also, a trade show for candy bars in Chicago, and how many Superman comics does it take to buy a beach hut in Southwold. This podcast may occasionally contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 75]
episodes.summary: A monkey with a camera. Plus, beer pong, talking plants, rhino snot, pregnant penguins, baby bum art, and how old is Georgina in dog years? May contain strong language. This podcast is sponsored by those lovely people at the Station Inn in Whitby.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 74]
episodes.summary: Rent a goat. Plus, 17,000 raincoats, hangover helpers, a sixty year old teacher called Steve, a pianist and some tortoises, and a robotic fly. Also, Georgina barks like a dog and Brian discovers some baby heads from Mars.  May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 73]
episodes.summary: A talking box of tissues. Plus, old ladies dressed as pirates, tinned Brussels sprouts, Sumo wrestlers with crying babies, moles doing archeology, self cleaning shirts, lazy horses, Sowerby & Luff tattoos, and Haikus in space. This podcast may contain strong language

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 72]
episodes.summary: Pyjamas that talk dirty to you. Plus, a cat with a vacuum cleaner, a goldfish wearing water wings, a remote controlled turtle, and a penis on Mars. Also, squirrel art, fist clenching, jumping spiders, and a vending machine full of babies. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 71]
episodes.summary: Cat dressed as shark chases duck. Plus, dancing on butter, liaising with Druids at Stonehenge, career progression in ants, massive heads, and why rodents don't vomit. Also, an app to stop you from accidentally marrying your own mother. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 70]
episodes.summary: A pocket-sized Georgina. Plus, Brian's pillow fight fantasies, dogs in tights, a giant robot, goldfish for hire, an Iranian time machine and two Dachshunds on a stairlift. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 69]
episodes.summary: A man who sued himself. Plus, mermaid for hire, camel balls, shopping bag underwear, an icetray from a labrador, and a sacred lettuce. Also, more tiny art and an overdose of Beechams Powders. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 68]
episodes.summary: Brian organises an Easter egg hunt in the studio. Plus, the world's oldest hot cross bun, a metal ballpen item, pajamas in Sainsburys, three Wigglers, a Worm to hold your iPad, lambs eating chocolate, dinosaurs reversing into each other, and a man in a deer mask with his face pressed up against a shop window. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina’s Fat Chance [Ep 67]
episodes.summary: A tiny talking prawn in an art gallery. Plus, shoes that tell you what to do, snails that eat worms, spiders covered in asbestos,  and a butt robot. Also, Brian plays golf in the toilet, and Georgina discovers the world’s longest eyebrow. May contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 66]
episodes.summary: Ant Colony Optimisation. Plus, a baby made of tomato ketchup, an alligator called Mr Stubbs, edible spray paint on a Brussels sprout, an indestructible mole rat, and a man in a nappy directing traffic. Also, heavily armed dolphins go missing, and Brian forgets Georgina's birthday. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 65]
episodes.summary: Can a chicken lay an egg if it's wearing a nappy? Plus, seagulls wearing false teeth, chucking Ninja throwing stars at students, a vampire facelift, and how many catepillars can you take into America? Also, ugly fish in a nightclub. This podcast may occasionally contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 64]
episodes.summary: Roadkill lasagne. Plus, a Grand Prix for prams, state approved haircuts, Bohemian wars, and what's wrong with Brian's ice cubes? This podcast may contain mildly strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 63]
episodes.summary: Bees on Mars. Plus, ticklish penguins, a detachable penis, setting fire to peanuts and a giant rabbit. Also, Brian's major problem with his pillow. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 62]
episodes.summary: The wrong kind of rubbish. Plus, a blind baby rhino, a secret passage to the pub, illegal trousers in Paris, a man dressed as a zebra, and is the Duchess of Cambridge Romanian? Also, transparent fish in a Think Tank. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 61]
episodes.summary: Banned in India? Plus, why Brian and Georgina are now forced to park their car two miles away from their flat, a fascinating dog, some squeaking church pews and a mysterious bottle of alcohol on the doorstep. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 60]
episodes.summary: Drunk Irish pigeons and running a car on goat's cheese. Plus, a getaway pantomime donkey, an army of snowmen and a dumbed down version of Jerry Springer. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 59]
episodes.summary: Are pubic lice a part of the Global Eco System? Plus, hairy faced Mexicans, computers with Tourette's Syndrome, and porn-addicted chimps. Also, should cutlery be judgmental and does the Queen enjoy doing jigsaws? This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 58]
episodes.summary: Brian wants to be Jools Holland. Plus, chocolate baby heads, tiny frogs in Speedos, washing up for the Queen, and a man who gets paid to smell people's bottoms. It's Sowerby & Luff's Bumper New Year Special, live from London.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance - Christmas Special 2012
episodes.summary: What do you get the Queen for Christmas?  Plus, Health & Safety Santa, a calendar full of cocks, alcoholic squirty cream, powdered meteorite face cream, poop on the moon, a dog called Wang, computers that can taste and smell, a swarm of tiny robots and a tortoise eating a water melon. A Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year from Sowerby & Luff.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 56]
episodes.summary: Is the whole Universe a simulation running on an iMac? Plus, donkey cheese, peeing on tomatoes, performing Shakespeare drunk, a fake cloud in the bathroom, meggings for men,  dogs eating tomato ketchup, cats stealing keys and a cleaning agency in Georgina's ear. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 55]
episodes.summary: Sowerby and Luff announce a bold plan to put the first vegetable on Mars. Plus King Diana the First, bacon-flavoured shaving cream and an Orangutan with his fingers in his ears.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 54]
episodes.summary: An airbag in your pants. Plus, horses with guns on their feet, a rainforest in your belly button, singing mice, a talking elephant, a helmet that cuts your hair and a 7 foot penguin. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 53]
episodes.summary: Why cannibals prefer the taste of parachutists. Plus, a pillow with breasts, a hedgehog blog, shopping on the loo, and how to rent out an entire country.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 52]
episodes.summary: Are pandas Spanish? Plus, glow in the dark pants, the world's worst hotel and a poorly fish. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 51]
episodes.summary: Spray-tanning the jobless. Plus, a woolly mammoth called Helmut, when ferrets attack, muddy shoes, see-through goldfish, and swearing aliens. Also, Georgina's crap dog whistle and Noisy Dad hires a deputy. This podcast is sponsored by The Station Inn in Whitby, North Yorkshire.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 50]
episodes.summary: It's the bumper Halloween edition of Fat Chance. Can horror films really help you to lose weight? Plus, a vampire squid, a giant eyeball and an agoraphobic owl. Also, Brian dresses as Dracula and pines for a pumpkin, and Georgina has part of her banana stolen.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 49]
episodes.summary: A man who lost his mobile phone in a cow's arse. Plus, a scientific exploration of Smartie flavours, whales who sound like football supporters and a diamond ring in a hot air balloon. Also, Brian takes up baking and Georgina rants about the colour pink. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 48]
episodes.summary: Nominated last week for a European Podcast Award, this edition of Fat Chance features the new David Attenborough drinking game, a nun stealing beer, pictures of cute puppies, feeding spiders through a straw, speaking to plants in a Geordie accent, and were the Ancient Romans responsible for Global Warming? Plus, does eating ice cream lead to prostitution?

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 47]
episodes.summary: What colour Smarties are bees attracted to?  Plus, Halloween pumpkin shortage,  free condoms at Cambridge, cardboard police officer stolen,  cockroach eating competition,  giant floating hamster wheel, beer made out of a bull's testicles and the horrors of staying in a Travelodge. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 46]
episodes.summary: Do people still draw circles? Plus, drinking booze through your bottom,  crows collecting loose change, Hoglets and Poggles, epitaphs for pigs' gravestones, an eel the size of a piece of asparagus, the brainpower of a jelly, leaning to the left, electronic wagging tails and an escaped giraffe. Also, do you stir your coffee clockwise or anti-clockwise and a major rant about Apple.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 45]
episodes.summary: A surprisingly long cucumber. Plus, woman burns pie, cabbages that sprout unexpected growths, dead flowers in the living room, and a bow tie wearing duck. Also, Brian's messy bathtime and a beauty contest for goldfish. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 44]
episodes.summary: How do you stimulate a cockroach? Plus, auditioning prenatal kittens, playing tennis in the sky, toilets for guide dogs and bumping into Mo Farah in Teddington. Also, drinking games to play while watching for Dallas. This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 43]
episodes.summary: Gibbons on helium. Plus, panties in a Hoover, dainty pens for ladies, a walrus in a Skittles commercial, a paper bag worth £185,  an ice cream that looks like Freddy Krueger, a cow in a tree, a long range contraceptive for Justin Bieber and a man called Ginger Swindlehurst. Warning: This podcast may contain strong language.

episodes.title: Brian and Georgina's Fat Chance [Ep 42]
episodes.summary: A podcast about all things Kiwi. Plus, an Apache in Wales, a woman who went looking for herself, a badly painted Jesus, a spam museum, an escaped lion in Essex, music from Mars, a turtle in a lake and a baffling message from General Inflatables. Also a little girl who says "I has sees da cars!"
